description: Bring the flavours of summer to your table with this vibrant salsa made with nectarines, lime and mint. Perfect with grilled fish or chicken, or in tacos.
keywords: Salsa,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Stone fruit,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Jan Feb 2021,Peanut free
name: Nectarine & Mint Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 yellow nectarines, halved, destoned, finely diced
1 small red capsicum, quartered, deseeded, finely diced
2 tbs mint leaves, finely chopped (plus extra leaves to serve)
2 limes, juiced (plus extra wedges to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the ingredients, except corn chips, in a medium bowl. Top salsa with extra mint, then serve with corn chips and extra lime wedges.
